bibl.title: On the Route to Siwa. A Late Roman Roadhouse at the Cistern Site Abar el-Kanayis on the Marmarica-Plateau.
bibl.note: 1. The location. - 2. The site. - 3. The history of the northwestern building [excavated in the years 2006-2007]. - 4. The function of the building as a roadhouse. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Mitteilungen des Deutschen Archäologischen Instituts. Abteilung Kairo

bibl.seg: Anna-Katharina Rieger, Heike Möller, Stephanie Valtin & Thomas Vetter, with contributions by Victoria Asensi, Ursula Thanheiser, Nadja Pöllath & Hans-Christoph Noeske, On the Route to Siwa. A Late Roman Roadhouse at the Cistern Site Abar el-Kanayis on the Marmarica-Plateau.
MDIK 68 (2012 [2014]) pp. 135-173, 2 tabl., 25 figg. n./bl. et coul.
1. The location. - 2. The site. - 3. The history of the northwestern building [excavated in the years 2006-2007]. - 4. The function of the building as a roadhouse. - Avec résumé en anglais.
